creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: couple walking, holding hands; male at L wears a badge and rests PL hand on a crutch, swinging his wooden peg leg forward; woman at R walking with a crutch with footless R leg forward
marks:
Signature

inscribed in graphite on mount: [Corn signed in plate, upper left: [COR.MET.]
title: The Lame Dancers
